HTTP Flood DDoS Attacks

Learn more about HTTP flood DDoS attacks, where attackers use what appear to be legitimate HTTP GET or POST requests to attack a web server or application.
Questions

Slow Read DDoS Attacks

Find out more about Slow Read DDoS attacks and learn how to keep your network safe from these increasingly common threats.
Questions

Slow Post DDoS Attacks

Learn more about Slow Post DDoS attacks, where attackers send legitimate HTTP POST headers to Web servers at a painfully slow speed.
